pr_title: [RHPAM-2813] Allow to use 'user' query parameter with /contents/output REST API.

timeline.bodyText: Cast to Map<String, Object> is not needed. Please, remove.
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.bodyText: This method description might be reworded, as to differ saveContenFromUser from the saveContent method.
timeline.author: afalhambra
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -494,6 +494,15 @@
      */
     Long saveContent(Long taskId, Map<String, Object> values);
     
+    /**
+     * Saves gives values as content of a task, applies to task output as input cannot be altered

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/jbpm-services/jbpm-services-api/src/main/java/org/jbpm/services/api/UserTaskService.java b/jbpm-services/jbpm-services-api/src/main/java/org/jbpm/services/api/UserTaskService.java
index f192c3efa..b424c7764 100644
--- a/jbpm-services/jbpm-services-api/src/main/java/org/jbpm/services/api/UserTaskService.java
+++ b/jbpm-services/jbpm-services-api/src/main/java/org/jbpm/services/api/UserTaskService.java

@@ -495,8 +495,9 @@ public interface UserTaskService {
     Long saveContent(Long taskId, Map<String, Object> values);
     
     /**
-     * Saves gives values as content of a task, applies to task output as input cannot be altered
+     * Saves given values as content of a task impersonating another user, applies to task output as input cannot be altered
      * @param taskId
+     * @param userId 
      * @param values
      * @return
      * @throws TaskNotFoundException in case task with given id was not found

timeline.bodyText:
Please, add the missing parameter "userId" in the doc.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @param taskId
          
          
            
                 * @param values
          
          
            
                 * @param taskId
          
          
            
                 * @param userId
          
          
            
                 * @param values
timeline.author: afalhambra
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -494,6 +494,15 @@
      */
     Long saveContent(Long taskId, Map<String, Object> values);
     
+    /**
+     * Saves gives values as content of a task, applies to task output as input cannot be altered
+     * @param taskId
+     * @param values

diff --git a/jbpm-services/jbpm-services-api/src/main/java/org/jbpm/services/api/UserTaskService.java b/jbpm-services/jbpm-services-api/src/main/java/org/jbpm/services/api/UserTaskService.java
index f192c3efa..b424c7764 100644
--- a/jbpm-services/jbpm-services-api/src/main/java/org/jbpm/services/api/UserTaskService.java
+++ b/jbpm-services/jbpm-services-api/src/main/java/org/jbpm/services/api/UserTaskService.java

@@ -495,8 +495,9 @@ public interface UserTaskService {
     Long saveContent(Long taskId, Map<String, Object> values);
     
     /**
-     * Saves gives values as content of a task, applies to task output as input cannot be altered
+     * Saves given values as content of a task impersonating another user, applies to task output as input cannot be altered
      * @param taskId
+     * @param userId 
      * @param values
      * @return
      * @throws TaskNotFoundException in case task with given id was not found
